title: "How to induce and control states of hypnosis and sleep through magnetic force?"
first_phrase: This text discusses the different states of hypnosis that can be induced through magnetic sleep, a method of inducing hypnosis through touch and suggestion. The text covers three states: cutaneous anesthesia, cataleptic state, and lethargic state. The process of inducing magnetic sleep is described, including the sensitivity test and contact stage, and the different types of longitudinal and transverse passes used to induce the hypnotic state. The text goes on to discuss the difference between physical magnetism and hypnosis, including exercises for developing magnetism and the power of suggestion. The last 200 tokens cover how to induce a state of lethargy in a subject and the power of hypnosis in medical procedures. The four phases required to create this state with well-trained subjects are described, along with how to wake them up from this state. The text concludes with a discussion of how magnetic sleep can be helpful in diagnosing and curing diseases, and techniques for using the method to stimulate tissue and promote healing.
